title: [CRITICAL] Migrate the LHNOptionsList to Flashlist

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

comments.body: Triggered auto assignment to @garrettmknight (`Bug`), see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/14418 for more details.

### Bug0 Triage Checklist ([Main S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418))

- [ ] This "bug" occurs on a supported platform (ensure `Platforms` in OP are ✅)
- [ ] This bug is not a duplicate report (check [E/App issues](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues) and [#expensify-bugs](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM))
    - If it is, comment with a link to the original report, close the issue and add any novel details to the original issue instead
- [ ] This bug is reproducible using the reproduction steps in the OP. [S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418#:~:text=The%20bug%20is%20reproducible)
    - If the reproduction steps are clear and you're unable to reproduce the bug, check with the reporter and QA first, then close the issue.
    - If the reproduction steps aren't clear and you determine the correct steps, please update the OP.
- [ ] This issue is filled out as thoroughly and clearly as possible
    - Pay special attention to the title, results, platforms where the bug occurs, and if the bug happens on staging/production.
- [ ] I have reviewed and subscribed to the linked Slack conversation to ensure Slack/Github stay in sync
Hi, I'm Tomasz from Callstack, I'd like to work on that issue
Waiting for #30242 to be reviewed and merged, once it's done I'll create a proper PR
Ok, then let's put this one HOLD for that
#30242 is merged now, we can remove hold status
Most of the work is done here, i just need to double check it on all platforms. Tomorrow morning i should send it for internal review and then create a PR
Looks like @TMisiukiewicz was off for a few days - we'll get back to this on Monday.
@garrettmknight, @TMisiukiewicz, @roryabraham Huh... This is 4 days overdue. Who can take care of this?
@garrettmknight, @TMisiukiewicz, @roryabraham Huh... This is 4 days overdue. Who can take care of this?
Still working on fixing the tests, [described details in a comment under a PR](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/31052#issuecomment-1808559578)
Unit tests are green now, hovewer one reassure test is failing. Gonna investigate it tomorrow.

⚠️ Looks like this issue was linked to a **Deploy Blocker** [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31610)

If you are the assigned CME please investigate whether the linked PR caused a regression and leave a comment with the results.

If a regression has occurred and you are the assigned CM follow the instructions [here](https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/13647).

If this regression could have been avoided please consider also proposing a recommendation to the PR checklist so that we can avoid it in the future.

Trying to figure out if the regression #31610 comes from this PR, but I can't reproduce it. The logic for displaying the skeleton remains the same, the only thing that changed were styles. Left the more detailed comment  [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31610#issuecomment-1821107051). IMO it is very unlikely that the regression comes from the PR, since the logic behind displaying the skeleton is the same as before.

⚠️ Looks like this issue was linked to a **Deploy Blocker** [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31803)

If you are the assigned CME please investigate whether the linked PR caused a regression and leave a comment with the results.

If a regression has occurred and you are the assigned CM follow the instructions [here](https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/13647).

If this regression could have been avoided please consider also proposing a recommendation to the PR checklist so that we can avoid it in the future.

body:
HOLD on https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/30242

Part of https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/28902

Let's migrate [LHNOptionsList](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/bce37385dbc60a4dcade3b357fd346ac683d5547/src/components/LHNOptionsList/LHNOptionsList.js#L76-L89) to use Flashlist component instead of FlatList

Callstack is working on the migration right now.

Lets use this issue for daily updates on this migration

<details><summary>Issue Owner</summary>Current Issue Owner: @TMisiukiewicz</details>
